PCEAssistant¶

public class PCEAssistant¶

Methods¶

compareEthPipes¶

public boolean compareEthPipes(ReservedEthPipeE pipe1, ReservedEthPipeE pipe2)¶

compareMplsPipes¶

public boolean compareMplsPipes(ReservedMplsPipeE pipe1, ReservedMplsPipeE pipe2)¶

constructJunctionPairToPipeEROMap¶

public void constructJunctionPairToPipeEROMap(Map<List<TopoVertex>, Map<String, List<TopoVertex>>> junctionPairToPipeEROMap, Map<List<TopoVertex>, Layer> allJunctionPairs, List<Map<Layer, List<TopoVertex>>> azSegments, List<Map<Layer, List<TopoVertex>>> zaSegments)¶

Construct a mapping of Junction Pairs (two vertices) to the AZ/ZA listing of vertices (the pipe) between those two junctions. Updates the pased in junctionPairToPipeEROMap and the allJunctionPairs map to keep track of which junction pairs have been created.

Parameters:
  • junctionPairToPipeEROMap –
    • A mapping between junction pairs and pipe vertices.
  • allJunctionPairs –
    • A mapping between Junction pairs and layer (determines what kind of pipe to create)
  • azSegments –
    • The path segments in the AZ direction
  • zaSegments –
    • The path segments in the ZA direction

decideEthPipeType¶

public EthPipeType decideEthPipeType(DeviceModel aModel, DeviceModel zModel)¶

Given the models of the starting/ending devices of an Ethernet pipe, determine the pipe’s type

Parameters:
  • aModel –
    • The A junction’s model
  • zModel –
    • The Z junction’s model
Throws:
  • PSSException –
Returns:

The ethernet pipe’s type

  • zModel –
    • The Z junction’s device model

decompose¶

public static List<Map<Layer, List<TopoVertex>>> decompose(List<TopoEdge> edges)¶

Given a list of edges, convert that list to into a number of segments, based on layer. An ETHERNET segment is made entirely of switches and their ports, while a MPLS segment consists of routers and their ports.

Parameters:
  • edges –
    • The edges to be decomposed into segments.
Returns:

A list of > pairs (segments).

neededJunctionResources¶

public Map<ResourceType, List<String>> neededJunctionResources(ReservedVlanJunctionE vj)¶

Determine what resources are needed for provisioning this reserved junction.

Parameters:
  • vj –
    • The reserved junction
Throws:
  • PSSException –
Returns:

A mapping of the needed resources

neededPipeResources¶

public Map<String, ResourceType> neededPipeResources(ReservedMplsPipeE vp)¶

    • The reserved pipe
Throws:

palindromicEros¶

public boolean palindromicEros(List<TopoEdge> azERO, List<TopoEdge> zaERO)¶

Confirm that the two EROs are identical

Parameters:
  • azERO –
    • A path in one direction
  • zaERO –
    • A path in another direction
Returns:

True if they are identical, False otherwise.
